#summary This is the Example 4 using the Java API

= Identify all human genes which are linked to asthma drugs using the Java API =

The Java Code for this example is [http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/src/main/java/org/jbiowh/tools/examples/FindGenefromDrug.java here]

Go to a CMD Windows console or a linux console to execute the java code: 

<code language="bash">
java -cp <path-to the-jbiowh-jar-file> org.jbiowh.tools.examples.FindGenefromDrug
</code>

The obtained gene number is the same that in the others methods.
